column4: hi all, I had a dual-boot with XP and just reinstalled, now I lost grub. I remember something about restoring grub with the live-cd. how can I do this?
in the live cd open a terminal and type grub, you will get a grub shell
where is your primary boot partition?
do you have more than one disk? what parttion is ubuntu installed on?
in the grub shellt type "root (hd0,0) to install grub on the mbr of the first hard disk, then do:
setup (hd0) if you have installed ubuntu to the first partiition of hte first disk
have to boot into the live-cd first ;)
